definition: pad/cushion/mat/to pad out/to fill a gap/to pay for sb/to advance (money)

sentences.english: And the wormcast was used in the experiment group.
sentences.chinese: 處理組以蚯蚓糞爲墊料。

sentences.english: Silica gel cat litter is to use the silica gel as the padding material.
sentences.chinese: 硅膠貓砂，即用硅膠做寵物墊料。

sentences.english: Spilled water also falls under the roosts rather than into the litter.
sentences.chinese: 灑出來的水會落到棲息架下而不會進入墊料。

sentences.english: In fact, the white poplar and corncob are ideal bedding materials.
sentences.chinese: 認爲楊木和玉米芯是比較理想的木材墊料原料。

sentences.english: Install a heat lamp and turn it on the day before farrowing.
sentences.chinese: 在分娩前一個星期，每天供應一次墊料。

sentences.english: A popular housing design for cows and heifers alike includes sand bedding.
sentences.chinese: 沙墊牀是泌乳母牛和青年母牛等常用的墊料之一。

sentences.english: Within a few weeks the worms will move to the new bedding.
sentences.chinese: 幾周之內，蚯蚓就會移動到新墊料中。

sentences.english: For composting with worms, you need bedding that is moist but not too wet.
sentences.chinese: 蚯蚓堆肥的墊料要保持溼潤，但不能太溼。

sentences.english: Remove any worms that remain on top of the bedding after two hours.
sentences.chinese: 兩小時後，將仍然停留在墊料表面的蚯蚓拿走。

sentences.english: Now you can remove the compost and fill the empty space with new bedding.
sentences.chinese: 這時你就可以把堆肥取走，再用新的墊料補充空位。

sentences.english: The mixture of solid waste and dry litter works its way down-slope into the waste alley as a result of natural pig activity.
sentences.chinese: 豬在活動時使幹墊料與固體豬糞的混合物滑到糞溝去。
